channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-EMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-EMail

item.title: CVE-2022-1614|2024-08-03T00:10:03.664Z -- unknown -- wp-email
item.description: The WP-EMail WordPress plugin before 2.69.0 prioritizes getting a visitor's IP from certain HTTP headers over PHP's REMOTE_ADDR, which makes it possible to bypass IP-based anti-spamming restrictions.

item.title: CVE-2022-1630|2024-08-03T00:10:03.946Z -- unknown -- wp-email
item.description: The WP-EMail WordPress plugin before 2.69.0 does not protect its log deletion functionality with nonce checks, allowing attacker to make a logged in admin delete logs via a CSRF attack
